data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LJYmUzLob3EQ7kNvgF-_sDQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCly4WX-IcT3Tu4hPtykiDKtsOkYiGaRVgytx3RoHoBlg&oe=667410B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-1J-jhZC_YQQ7kNvgFuk0Qg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBGMfOEG8xNkfkuQ4VdY4PfRi-hE3ZpMZWgU8nEyFfEXg&oe=66741E52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1M9OiHf4Uo0Q7kNvgEOJtyj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC7Rx5pjTMyl8Qx_67jMr0qrlXrT1YtQskfvkV__F4Sjw&oe=66740989)
